title: BNB Transfer Maximum Amount
natural_language_templates: Send my entire BNB balance to {to_address}
Transfer the maximum amount of BNB to {to_address}
I want to transfer all my BNB to {to_address}
description: Transfer the maximum possible amount of BNB to an address, which is the current balance minus the gas cost for the transaction.
- Query the current balance using eth_getBalance RPC call
- Calculate the gas cost: gasLimit × gasPrice (or maxFeePerGas for EIP-1559)
- The maximum transferable amount = balance - gas cost
- This is a common pattern when users want to "empty" an address
- Calculate gas cost accurately to avoid insufficient balance error
- For EIP-1559: gas cost = gasLimit × maxFeePerGas
- Leave enough for gas, otherwise the transaction will fail

pre_conditions.description: Agent must have sufficient BNB balance

post_conditions.description: Sender balance should be close to 0 (only dust remaining)
